languages.text: "Мне кажется... Я словно каким-то образом был{mf||а} с тобой... Такое возможно?"

traits.locale_text: "Я видел{mf||а} твою охоту, словно сам{mf||а} на ней побывал{mf||а}. Как такое возможно?"

languages.text: "It felt like... I was with you somehow... Is that even possible?"
languages.original_text: "Мне кажется... Я словно каким-то образом был{mf||а} с тобой... Такое возможно?"

traits.locale_text: "I think... I saw your hunt as if I was there myself. Is such a thing possible?"
"I think... I saw your hunt as if I was there myself. Is such a thing possible?"
"It felt like... I was with you somehow... Is that even possible?"
"It felt like... like I was watching your hunt as if I was there myself. Is that even possible?"
"It felt like... I was with you somehow... Is that even possible?"
"It felt like... I was with you somehow... Is that even possible?"
"It felt like... I was with you somehow... Is that even possible?"

languages.text: «Ha sido como... si estuviera con usted, de algún modo... ¿Es eso posible?».
languages.original_text: "It felt like... I was with you somehow... Is that even possible?"

traits.locale_text: «Ha sido como... si estuviera con usted, de algún modo... ¿Es eso posible?».

languages.text: 「まるで…お前になったかのような気分だった。そんなことがあり得るのか？」
languages.original_text: "It felt like... I was with you somehow... Is that even possible?"

traits.locale_text: 「まるで…お前になったかのような気分だった。そんなことがあり得るのか？」

languages.text: “那种感觉就像……我和你在一起狩猎一样……但这怎么可能呢？”
languages.original_text: "It felt like... I was with you somehow... Is that even possible?"

traits.locale_text: “那种感觉就像……我和你在一起狩猎一样……但这怎么可能呢？”

languages.text: "Es fühlte sich an wie ... Ich war irgendwie bei Euch ... Ist das überhaupt möglich?"
languages.original_text: "It felt like... I was with you somehow... Is that even possible?"

traits.locale_text: "Es fühlte sich an wie ... Ich war irgendwie bei Euch ... Ist das überhaupt möglich?"

languages.text: « J'ai eu l'impression... d'être là, à vos côtés... Comment est-ce possible ? »
languages.original_text: "It felt like... I was with you somehow... Is that even possible?"

traits.locale_text: « J'ai eu l'impression... d'être là, à vos côtés... Comment est-ce possible ? »

languages.text: "Sanki... Bir şekilde yanındaydım... Böyle bir şey mümkün mü?"
languages.original_text: "It felt like... I was with you somehow... Is that even possible?"
